numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Women send text messages to their parents more often than men send text messages to their parents.
2. Men send text messages to their parents.
3. Women contact their parents more often than men contact their parents.
4. Voting in person has the lowest percentage among the forms of communication.
5. I wonder how big the difference is between states.
6. I wonder how big the difference is between countries.
7. I wonder whether the difference is due to coddling.
8. I wonder whether the difference is due to a bad relationship between children and their parents.
9. I am going to college soon.
10. I may live in a dorm.
11. If I live in a dorm, then I will contact my parents more often than if I live at home.
12. Some seniors may live in a dorm.
13. If a senior lives in a dorm, then the senior will contact the senior's parents more often than if the senior lives at home.
14. The headline is: How Often Do You Call Your Parents?
